description:
Wordpress is the most used blogging platform in the world. At the same time, this platform gives you the opportunity to create an unique website created on your own ideas , without the need to know anything about programming.

This is possible because of the huge number of free plugins that you can install as well as the large number of free themes that you can install to create the look of your website.

This course will lay the foundations of your knowledge for Wordpres and will show you, step by step, how to create your new website, how to install and set up Wordpress and how to make it working for you.

The course contains the following tutorials :

  • Video 1. Getting Started With Wordpress
  • Video 2. Installing Wordpress Quickly
  • Video 3. Configure Wordpress Easily
  • Video 4. Introduction To Plugins
  • Video 5. Installing Plugins
  • Video 6. Adding Pages and Posts
  • Video 7. Adding Pictures and Videos
  • Video 8. Introduction To Themes
  • Video 9. How To Use Widgets
  • Video 10. Using Wordpress Menus
  • Video 11. Setup A Simple Wordpress Site
title: Wordpress tutorials for beginners
